reference.shortdesc: Link information is a description of the links that are contained in a linklist element. It can provide additional information about those links.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: The linkinfo element is considered part of the content flow and commonly rendered as a paragraph.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how the linkinfo element provides additional information about the group of links titled "Repairing widgets":
example.codeblock: <linklist> <title>Repairing widgets</title> <link href="debug.dita" type="task"/> <link href="repair.dita" type="task"/> <link href="test.dita" type="task"/> <linkinfo>To repair a reciprocating widget,follow the instructions carefully and in the specified order.</linkinfo> </linklist>
